name: Saverio'sPizza
0:
”Alexa, open Saverio’s Pizza”
”Alexa, start Saverio’s Pizza”
”Alexa, launch Saverio’s Pizza”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saverio's pizza
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The official Skill for Saverio's Authentic Pizza in Massapequa. This skill will notify you of the latest weekly special that Saverio is making in the kitchen!

Specials are generally available Tuesday - Thursday
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
